parameters.name: CatalogName
parameters.description: The name of the data catalog to query.

parameters.name: DataRegion
parameters.description: The region where the data lake resides.

parameters.name: DbName
parameters.description: The name of the database to which the table belongs.

parameters.name: Rows
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: SearchKey
parameters.description: The keyword that is used to search for tables.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The tenant ID. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) operation to query the tenant ID.
